item.title: Python – Building a Cisco Type 7 Decrypt Tool
item.description: I wrote a small python script that can decrypt cisco type 7 passwords. Cisco7Decrypt on Github You can decrypt password directly through the CLI: 1 2 → python cisco7decrypt.py 12090404011C03162E password If you want the command accessible from anywhere, just link it to a folder that’s included in your Path. In this example ‘~/bin’ 1 ln-sn`pwd`/cisco7decrypt.py~/bin/cisco7decrypt
